help.finishLaterHeadline: Do you want to come back to the application later?
help.buttonWhatIsCreditCard: How does a credit card work?

howItWorks.title: How does a credit card work?
howItWorks.subtitle: You get up to 55 days interest-free to either pay off the full balance or just part of it.
bullets: Each month, you can shop up to the limit of your credit card.
If you pay off the full balance by the 25th of the following month, you won’t pay any interest. If you only make the minimum repayment, the remaining balance will start to accrue interest.

texts.title: Benefits
texts.detail: SThere are no opening and management fees as long as you spend at least CZK 3,000 per month. You’ll also earn 1% back on purchases in a category of your choice.

texts.title: Glossary
texts.detail: By applying for a credit card, you’re entering into a revolving credit agreement, which means you’ll have access to a credit limit that you can use through your credit card. The interest-free period is, for example, the time from the 1st of one month to the 20th of the following month. During this period, you can use the credit without paying interest, provided you repay the full amount by the due date stated on your statement. Note: The interest-free period does not apply to bank transfers made from the credit card Billing period refers to the time from the 1st to the last day of the calendar month Interest rate is an annual interest rate. The borrowed amount is charged interest daily, starting from the day you use the credit, based on the number of days in the given calendar month / 365. Credit card repayment means paying back part or all of the borrowed amount. The total amount due is shown on your monthly statement and can be paid by regular bank transfer or automatically via direct debit. Minimum repayment is the amount you need to pay by the 20th of each month. It is set at 2% of your outstanding balance. We’ll automatically set up a direct debit for this minimum payment. If you prefer to repay the full balance, you can do so by bank transfer or automatically by setting up full direct debit. 100% direct debit is a convenient option that automatically repays your full balance each month (on the 20th), as long as you're within the interest-free period. If you don’t repay the full amount by the 20th of the following month — or if you use the card for a bank transfer — interest will be charged on the remaining balance at a rate of 22.99% p.a Payment order from the credit card is similar to a one-time transfer from a current account. This is the only service not covered by the interest-free period — interest starts accruing from the next day after the transfer is made.

howItWorks.confusedHeadline: Do you need assistance or have any questions?

intro.title: Shop with our card and get money back
bullets: You’ll get 5% back on every grocery purchase.
Plus, get 1% back on purchases in a category of your choice.
It’s perfect for travel and shopping abroad.
Apply for it online in Smart Banka and start using it right away with Google Pay or Apple Pay.
Shop now, pay later – enjoy up to 50 days interest-free.
You can easily manage your card re payments in Smart Banka

reward.title: First, choose a category where you’ll earn 1% back.
bullets: The reward applies both in-store and online at all merchants in your chosen category — over 12,000 shops in total.
We’ll credit the amount to your account retroactively each month — up to CZK 500.
footers: You can change the category once per calendar quarter — in the Smart Banka app, Internet Banka, at a branch, or by calling 224 443 636.

limits.title: What’s Your Credit Limit with the MoneyCard Smart?
limits.help: How does a credit card work?
limits.lessTitle: If you spend up to 3,000 CZK a month
limits.moreTitle: If you spend at least 3,000 CZK a month
limits.detail:
Representative example of a revolving credit and credit card is based on the assumption that a credit limit of CZK 37,800 is fully used immediately through cashless transactions and repaid in 12 equal monthly repayments of CZK 3,604.90.
The credit card allows repayment in varying monthly amounts, but at least 2% of the drawn credit limit.
Loan term: indefinite. Annual interest rate: 22.99%. Fees related to the credit: monthly card maintenance fee CZK 49, cost of electronic statement delivery CZK 0, APR 28.91%, total amount payable by the consumer CZK 43,258.
If you make higher or more frequent repayments, or use the card within the interest-free period for cashless purchases, the figures in this representative example may vary.

Your card details are securely stored in the Click to Pay system, which the merchant does not have access to. By proceeding, you agree to the terms of service, which will also be saved in your Documents. You can deactivate this service anytime in Smart Banka.

dependents.title: How many dependents do you have?
dependents.detail: A dependent is anyone who relies on your income — even partially — such as children, a partner on parental leave, or a person with a disability you care for.  How many people close to you would be affected by a reduction in your income?

householdExpensesNecessary.necessaryExpensesSection: What essential expenses do you cover as a loan applicant?
householdExpensesNecessary.necessaryExpensesInfo: Only include the expenses — or the portion of them — that you personally cover. Essential expenses are those that are necessary and unavoidable.

Children’s education (nurseries, kindergartens, schools, lunches, after-school programs, extracurricular activities)
Please do not include loan repayments, mortgages, or wage garnishments.

otherInfo.title: Just final details:

agreement.title: Final step – just one last consent needed
agreement.detail:
In order to process your application, it is essential to handle your personal data to assess your creditworthiness, reliability, and payment behavior. This includes verifying your information in the Banking Client Information Register, the Non-Banking Client Information Register, and taking other necessary steps to facilitate agreement conclusion.

For more details about how your personal data is processed within the MONETA financial group, please visit www.moneta.cz/ochrana-dat. By clicking 'Agree,' I confirm that I have read and understood this information.

I declare that all the information I have provided is accurate, complete, and up-to-date. I understand that providing false information may result in legal consequences, including criminal liability. I also consent to the bank verifying the information and conducting any further checks it deems necessary regarding this application.

I acknowledge that the information provided is a recommendation, not financial advice, as per the Consumer Credit Act. 

You may receive updates on the status of your application via SMS to the phone number provided.

scoringOkBranch.title: We will be able to assist you better at a branch
scoringOkBranch.detail:
Before signing the Agreement, we’ll need to verify your ID — so please visit one of our branches.

If you’ve updated your net monthly income, make sure to bring a Confirmation of Income from your employer as well.

setPassword.title: Set up a six-digit passcode to activate your card
setPassword.detail:
Be sure to remember your passcode— you’ll need it when your card arrives.
You’ll find full activation instructions inside the envelope with your card.

help.title: How would you like to repay?
help.detail: 100% Direct Debit Each month, the full outstanding amount is automatically repaid within the interest-free period. Minimum Direct Debit Each month, an automatic payment of 2% of the outstanding balance from your statement will be made as the minimum payment. You can settle the remaining balance separately, such as via bank transfer. If the full amount is not repaid within the 55-day interest-free period, the remaining balance will incur interest at an annual rate of 22.99% p.a. Payment Order You can repay your credit card by transferring funds from any account to the one listed on your statement — where you’ll also find the amount due. Make sure to use your contract number as the variable symbol. It is important that you always repay at least the minimum required amount.

configuration.title: Final details
configuration.statements: How would you like to receive your statements?
configuration.repayment: On the 20th of each month, you’d like to repay via:

waitingAfterSign.title: Now it’s our turn to sign the Agreement, just a moment please

victory.title: Done, the card should arrive within a week
victory.detail:
In the envelope with your card, you’ll find simple instructions on how to activate it and get your PIN.  
You can also add the card to your phone and start using it right away.

All your documents are available in the “Documents” section of both Smart Banka and Internet Banka.
